channel.title: Things we expected from update
channel.description:
I think stuff we expected but didn't happen from the recent update.
castle pking would be back lobs and pk gear in general would go up flipping being impossible to do.

item.title: Things we expected from update
item.dc:creator: @nacional nacional
item.description:
@nacional wrote:

I wish they would update that place, and up the amount of runes there by 10x.
Get some pking going there.

Read full topic

item.title: Things we expected from update
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:12, topic:382205”][quote author=IlikeArrays link=topic=478008.msg3500637#msg3500637 date=1297710483]

never heard of it, what is this “Castle Pking”

Never was much of a pker lol

Castle above edge. 14-16 wild? Was a great place to pk players because your in a building and you can go up and down ladders etc. Team pking in there was fun but the only downside was near it there was a 1v1 zone next by which people would run into to get away.
[/quote]
oh… so thats what that was called… is that the place were the runes would spawn? Lol i would always make money of that, never got pked there :D[/quote]

That is the place.

Read full topic

item.title: Things we expected from update
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:6, topic:382205”]Why does it matter? Castle pking is multi, so is varrock?

Lobs, there are more ways to catch them now, they are not worth it anymore. people use swordies more.[/quote]

Not to mention 1000s of botters are botting lobbies.

Read full topic

item.title: Things we expected from update
item.dc:creator: @nacional nacional
item.description:
@nacional wrote:

castle is not entirely multi. Also the good part, it’s that its not in the border.
Varrock pking sucks, it’s a shitload of teams. Yeah I’ve also notice everyone
is on swordfish now. Good thing I guess.

Read full topic
